typing_text: Crack the Code, Shape the Future.

sec_about.title: What is MariHacks?
sec_about.text: MariHacks is Montreal's first and largest 2-day hackathon for CEGEP and High School students. We will bring together over 200 developers and technology enthusiasts to create revolutionary software projects. Meet fellow hackers, learn new technologies, and hone your skills alongside amazing mentors.
